item.title: Xtend Call Plus
item.dc:creator: Good Student
item.description: Xtend your limits with the largest display in Xtend series yet. With a 1.91” HD display and 90% screen to body ratio, boAt Xtend Call Plus takes display clarity to the next level. Accurate insights with 100+ sports modes, heart rate and blood oxygen monitor helps you in being on top of your health at all times. To extend all that you can do the with a smartwatch, it also has single-chip bluetooth and AI noise cancellation that allows you to connect with your loved ones seamlessly with crystal clarity by subdueing background sound during calls. Wrap it on your wrist and xtend what you can do with a smartwatch. Read more at: https://www.boat-lifestyle.com/products/xtend-call-plus-largest-display-smartwatch?variant=40340131414114
item.content:encoded:
Xtend your limits with the largest display in Xtend series yet. With a 1.91” HD display and 90% screen to body ratio, boAt Xtend Call Plus takes display clarity to the next level. Accurate insights with 100+ sports modes, heart rate and blood oxygen monitor helps you in being on top of your health at all times. To extend all that you can do the with a smartwatch, it also has single-chip bluetooth and AI noise cancellation that allows you to connect with your loved ones seamlessly with crystal clarity by subdueing background sound during calls. Wrap it on your wrist and xtend what you can do with a smartwatch.

Read more at: https://www.boat-lifestyle.com/products/xtend-call-plus-largest-display-smartwatch?variant=40340131414114
